name: True Colors [Early Access]
description:
• Dozen of original 3D rendered CGs & BGs
  • Result screen and Gallery screen
  • Implemented sound and music

For more information please visit my Patreon.

Heroine Starring
Note from the developer

Most of the rendered images were originally created by me using various assets from many communities. That’s why this game is released for free for the public!

The full credit can be found --- HERE

This game is created by only one person. If you played the game once and were impressed, please consider supporting me on Patreon.

I really appreciate you guys for giving my project a go! Any feedback or support really means a lot to me!

Thank you very much!
